summary: Completed comprehensive testing of internal company social app. Backend APIs working excellently (91.4% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with one critical React error in signup validation handling.

minor_issues.issue: Session cleared during password reset test cycle causing 3 auth failures in error handling tests
minor_issues.impact: Test-only issue, not affecting actual app functionality

ui_bugs.issue: React runtime error when form validation fails - 'Objects are not valid as a React child' with validation error object being rendered directly
ui_bugs.error_details: Error shows: object with keys {type, loc, msg, input, ctx, url} being rendered instead of error message text

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix React error in signup form validation - ensure error objects are converted to user-friendly error messages instead of being rendered directly as React children. The error occurs when validation fails on signup form.
